errors.fullName: Full name must fall in the format 'First Last', between 2-15 letters each. No special characters or tildes allowed
errors.favoriteColor: Color name must be between 3-15 letters, just one word

private.label: Keep friend private
private.description: No one can import it even when your list is public. (You can edit this later)

errors.fullName: Full name must fall in the format 'First Last', between 2-15 letters each. No special characters or tildes allowed
errors.favoriteColor: Color name must be between 3-15 letters, just one word

private.label: Keep friend private

deleteFriend.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteFriend.message: All data will be lost and the image will be deleted. You won't be able to undo this action.

friendInfo.tooltipVisible: Friend is public to everyone. It can be imported by anyone with your QR code or direct link
friendInfo.tooltipNotVisible: Friend is private. No one can see it or import it

login.message: The WebApp that will make your friends remember you because you remember them

notifications.listSuccess: Your list status was successfully updated
notifications.addedFailed: Something went wrong while adding your friend. Please try again later.
notifications.updatedFailed: Something went wrong while updating your friend. Please try again later.
notifications.deletedFailed: Something went wrong while deleting your friend. Please try again later.
notifications.importedFailed: Something went wrong while importing your friends. Please try again later.
notifications.listFailed: Something went wrong while getting your list status. Please try again later.
notifications.strangeQR: Looks like this QR Code or unique ID does not belong to this app
notifications.import: Import whoever you want from your friend's list

share.title: Do you want your friends list to be public?
share.message: Anybody who you share your QR code or direct link with will be able to import any of your friends marked as not private.
share.qrMessage: Have your friends scan this QR code:
share.qrPublic: Make your list public to get your QR code
share.directLink: Not close to scan the QR? Share your personal link:

import.title: Got a QR code? Scan it or upload it here!

shareImport.notSharing: We are sorry. Looks like your friend's list is not public at the moment.

spotlight.message: Start adding your friends to your list.
spotlight.title: No Friends

tour.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Happy B! A place where you can keep track of your loved ones and friends birthdays.
tour.spotlight: The person with the closest birthday will be highlighted here, so you don't miss it
tour.nextFriends: As well as the next 5 friends, so you are aware who's coming up soon
tour.allFriends: Get a glance at all of your friends, grouped by month
tour.qrCode: Want to let other people import your list of friends? We got you covered! Share your QR code or send them your direct link.
